body.name: Pamo Babe Umbrella Stroller, Lightweight Travel Stroller for Toddlers 1-3 Summer Stroller, Compact Foldable Baby Strollers for Newborns and Up to 33 lbs(Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 19 hrs 54 mins
features: 【Retractable handrail Design】Designed for parents who like to on-the-go. Its lean frame folds into a space-saving package that can fit in overhead compartments, under train seats or in car trunks.
【Lightweight stroller】Weighing only 9.26 lbs, the Pamo Babe baby stroller is portable enough to take practically anywhere. A lightweight stroller makes any outing a little easier!
【Adumbral Canopy】It has a hassle-free canopy with flip out sun visor that is perfect for sunny days. Brings your baby a comfortable outdoor experience.
【Smooth Strolling】 Treaded tires and optional front swivels create a smooth ride, while toe-tap rear brakes keep the stroller in place when parked.

【Durable & Safety】 This stroller has a durable frame and the Five-point safety belt always protects the safety of children.This stroller comes in a delightful fashion and accommodates a child up to 33 lbs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A stroller is just a stroller Minimalist design and sturdy construction - Our umbrella stroller for toddlers has a lightweight design, making it easy for parents to carry. We designed this baby stroller with a focus on simplicity and lightness, removing unnecessary accessories, making it an ideal choice for short trips. Whether in the neighborhood or for a walk in the park, our lightweight baby carriage provides a safe trip for your child.

Smooth Walking Whether taking a stroll around the neighborhood or enjoying picnics in the park, the umbrella stroller provides a comfortable ride. Sunscreen Canopy The canopy is made of 300D Oxford cloth, can help the baby to resist some sunshine. 5-Point Harness It is an effective safety device for securing children in baby carriages. Stable Frame It can withstand babies weighing up to 33 pounds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Traveler's Essential for Stress-Free Airport Adventures
reviews.reviewText: I bought this stroller specifically for an international flight with my toddler, and I must say, it served its purpose wonderfully. Here's what I appreciated about it:Streamlined and Simple Design: This stroller is refreshingly basic in its construction, which turned out to be perfect for our international travel needs. Sometimes, simplicity is exactly what you need, and this stroller delivered on that front.Compact and Nimble: Navigating through crowded airport facilities can be quite the challenge, but this stroller's small and agile design made it a breeze. Maneuvering it through bustling terminals and tight spaces was a cinch, even when I was traveling alone with my child. It is also easy to fold.Space Efficiency: One of the major reasons I opted for this stroller was its space efficiency. Bulkier strollers would have been a logistical nightmare during our travels. This one struck the right balance between functionality and portability.However, there are a couple of minor downsides to note:Storage Limitations: Unfortunately, the stroller lacks storage space underneath the seat, a feature that many strollers typically offer. This means you'll need to find an alternative storage solution for your essentials.Missing Cup Holder: Another minor drawback is the absence of a cup holder, which can be quite handy for parents on the go. Be prepared to carry a separate cup holder accessory or find an alternative way to keep your drinks within reach.In conclusion, this stroller proved to be a reliable companion for our international adventure, offering convenience and portability when we needed it most. While it may have some minor limitations in terms of storage and cup holder options, its compact design and ease of use make it a valuable addition for any parent navigating the challenges of air travel with a little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this for my grandson it saves me when he cries I put a minute and push him around the house and he goes right to sleep so this is been a lifesaver fast shipping great for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice lightweight umbrella stroller with a canopy
reviews.reviewText: Pamo Babe Umbrella Stroller, Lightweight Travel Stroller for Toddlers 1-3 Summer Stroller, Compact Foldable Baby Strollers for Newborns and Up to 33 lbs(Grey). Most parents I know end up using their umbrella stroller more than their regular stroller system just because how easy and lightweight they are. I am no different and wanted a stroller that is lightweight and easy to use. The Pamo Babe umbrella stroller is lightweight and simple to use. The stroller shade is the main reason I got this one vs. another umbrella stroller. Only thing I would love to add is a cup holder or small storage area under the seat. But that would possibly add weight and I prefer it to be lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small stroller
reviews.reviewText: We needed a small stroller for when we travel, as our big expensive stroller is amazing but also unfortunately huge. This stroller is light, easy to fold and unfold, and our son loves going for walks in it.

reviews.reviewText: My daught in law is very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stroller has us rolling laughing, it’s so funny it’s so small 😂 the baby’s barely fitting in there! A cross bar in the bottom would help it feel more fully extended and maybe less like a doll stroller? But hey it does the job lol! Also came with no instructions but it’s pretty self explanatory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It reads as of today 8/9/23, optional swivel wheels. However they are NOT optional! They only swivel . I purchased this product because the front wheels were optional. So that was disappointing Also, the front wheels say that there’s . treading. When I opened it along with someone else, we both did not see any sort of trading on the wheels. It was clearly just a line from the seam creating the wheel. Another reason I purchased the item.One other thing the handles are very poor quality. They are equivalent to an old doll stroller that we have from 20 years ago. When you go to maneuver the stroller, they bend the canopy is nice and color is lovely. The straps seem to be great.
